definition: to pair up/to match/to arrange in pairs/to add sth into a group
to put up/to build (scaffolding)/to hang (clothes on a pole)/to connect/to join/to arrange in pairs/to match/to add/to throw in (resources)/to take (boat, train)/variant of 褡[da1]
to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate

sentences.english: Mix master it, that is mastered exclamatory point.
sentences.chinese: 掌握它的搭配，即掌握了感嘆句的重點。

sentences.english: The finish is long and supple. Creamy pasta dishes, quiches or with cheese.
sentences.chinese: 這款酒是奶油意大利麪或奶酪的最佳搭配。

sentences.english: Serve with red meat, chicken, duck, goose and game.
sentences.chinese: 適合搭配紅肉，雞，鴨，鵝，野味。

sentences.english: It is arrange in pairs database of the field that make disambiguation do.
sentences.chinese: 並針對該領域建立了搭配知識庫，作爲消歧的依據。

sentences.english: Here’s the deal: black, brown, and navy are all neutrals.
sentences.chinese: 決不要把黑色與棕色或深藍色搭配在一起。

sentences.english: Recommendations with red meat, grilled and cooked cheese.
sentences.chinese: 建議搭配紅肉，燒烤和熟奶酪飲用。

sentences.english: Contraste Bar features a range of tapas paired with cocktails and an international beer list.
sentences.chinese: 對比各種tapas搭配雞尾酒和國際啤酒名單。

sentences.english: We’ll point out some useful collocations related to daily office work as we go through this lesson.
sentences.chinese: 我們會指出一些與日常辦公室工作相關的搭配。

sentences.english: It is usually served with rice or with noodles.
sentences.chinese: 肉骨茶通常用來搭配米飯或麪條。

sentences.english: Concomitant use with other acne clear series will better the effect.
sentences.chinese: 與其他粉刺淨顏系列產品搭配使用，效果更佳。

sentences.english: This wine goes great with herb roasted chicken or seared snapper with capers.
sentences.chinese: 這款酒搭配香草烤雞或清烤魚最佳。

sentences.english: Lens ark and under the ark of perfect collocation, let beauty regardless of the dayside and night.
sentences.chinese: 鏡櫃與下櫃的完美搭配，讓美麗不分晝與夜。

sentences.english: These leggings look really good with a simple long top and platform heels.
sentences.chinese: 這條打底褲搭配一件簡單的長上衣跟厚底鞋就很棒了。

sentences.english: This is basically Parsley pesto and accompanies the large steak you’ve just ordered.
sentences.chinese: 這基本上就是用來搭配大肉排的西芹醬。

sentences.english: Rather, they should be flesh-coloured under white shirts.
sentences.chinese: 此外，白色職業裝必須搭配淺肉色內衣褲。

definition: to mix and match (of clothing etc)
to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate
to take off costume and makeup/bottom garment (trousers etc)

to return to old ways (a Confucian aspiration)/to turn back the clock/neoclassical school during Tang and Song associated with classical writing 古文/retro (fashion style based on nostalgia, esp. for 1960s)
the brush stroke that dots in the eyes (idiom); fig. to add the vital finishing touch/the crucial point that brings the subject to life/a few words to clinch the point
